name: Jonathan Reinink
title: I came to Camera Mania looking for a camera to take on vacations and trips. I am in no way a photographer, but wow! Look at the quality! I am in love with this camera best thing its cheep

name: Mr. Ronnie
title: I've owned so many great APS-C and full frame cameras both high and low end. This one is my favorite! Canon just nails the colors and so I now rarely shoot raw since the jpg are that good.

name: Newton JoJo
title: For the price, this camera is a real bargain. You get the beautiful Canon color and easy to use ergonomics. It is weaker in low light than many of it's competitors - that would be my only negative comment.

name: B. Owens
title: I upgraded from a Canon 70D and couldn't be more satisfied. After years of going cheap with APC cameras, going full frame for this price was a no-jock. I think the RP is going to be a huge success.

name: Andrew C.
title: Camera is good one thing is the auto focus struggles at times, but it could also be the 50mm RF lens not too Sure. The quality is too good I feel like I might have to pay more attention to my skin

name: Ignacio R.
title: I received the camera in one day directly from Amazon. I went through the menu settings and I connected the wifi to my phone. The camera suddenly got frozen. Not recommended
